DOC.brief_title: Treatment Mitochondrial Dysfunction Rett Syndrome With Triheptanoin
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study evaluate safety tolerability triheptanoin participant Rett syndrome use laboratory value , electrocardiogram , rate adverse event ( AE ) , physical exam . This study also seek evaluate efficacy UX007 ( triheptanoin ) improve overall seizure frequency , dystonia severity , quality life . Participants eligible take triheptanoin daily . Participation study last 8.5 month .
